mapper.select: select avg(clicked) as clicked from wishlist where id=#{id} and num=#{num}
mapper.insert: insert into wishlist(id, num, clicked) values(#{id}, #{num}, 1)
mapper.delete: delete from wishlist where id=#{id} and num=#{num}
mapper.select: select imgurl from (select * from test_item order by view_count desc) where rownum <= 6
